A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: old timer here...i remember life on earth before star wars existed. experienced the world change around me that star wars ushered into the world. spent years of my life in wonder amazed at the leaps and bounds in technology and visual effects each film brought. became interested in archetypes and mythology.\n\nI don't quite know what it is about this film\, but i felt like star wars had finally died and i was watching a a film that was 'weekend at bernies'-ing star wars. I loved brick and looper etc... i don't blame rian j.\, i blame myself i guess\, for getting old and curmudgeonly and aging out of the demographic i guess. sigh
